page.title: 17Religion-Taverham & Ringland
page.content: Of those who attend church in {Taverham,}C of E parishioners go to St Edmund's which is mentioned in the original Domesday Book, Methodists use the village hall, Roman Catholics go to St Augustines in Costessey, and the rest attend various denominations in Norwich. Out of 58 people interviewed in our area of Taverham, only 6 attend church regularly,32 go only on special occasions, and 20 never go. Out of 24 people questioned in {Ringland,}8 attend church regularly, 4 go only on special occasions, and 12 never go. None of those questioned attend a church outside Ringland. Ringland and Taverham churches have to share a parson,{The Rev. R. {Hewetson,}who is also the chairman of governors for our school, St. Edmund's C of E. V.C. Middle School.
